subject: From Swiss National Bank (SNB)
body:
Swiss National Bank (SNB)
Address: Börsenstrasse 15, Zurich,
8022, Switzerland
Phone: 41586410000

Attention: Mrs. Gloria,

Dear Sir/Madam,

We the management of Swiss National Bank (SNB) wished to bring to your 
notice that there is a pending $3,500,000:00 approved by President Joe 
Biden on your behalf, you are to kindly respond to us indicating your 
willing to receive the funds or we cancel the payment.

We wait for your reply within 48 hours.

We are Poised to serve you better.

Mr. Thomas Jordan
Chairperson of the Swiss National Bank

subject: Re: From Swiss National Bank (SNB)
body:
Hello! Thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate the information about the pending approval by President Joe Biden. Could you please provide more details about the funds and the process for receiving them? I would like to understand how everything works before proceeding.

Best wishes,
Gloria

subject: Re: From Swiss National Bank (SNB)
body:
Swiss National Bank (SNB)
Address: Börsenstrasse 15, Zurich,
8022, Switzerland
Phone: 41586410000

Attention: Gloria,

Dear Madam,

We the management of Swiss National Bank (SNB) acknowledged your reply.  
This is a compensation grant approved by US President Mr. Joe Biden on 
your behalf and social grant to business,company owners.

You are on this notice, required to orderly send the following 
information of yours to us to process the funds for immediate releasing 
to you.

Send the following details:
Your full names
Contact Address
Phone Numbers
Your Next of Kin
Passport/Identification of you

All the necessary approvals to back up the release of this money to you 
safely will be issued by the appropriate body upon our confirmation of 
your personal details, option of payment and readiness to receive the 
money.

Be rest assured that we are going ensure that rule of rule is respected.

We are Poised to serve you better.

Mr. Thomas Jordan
Chairperson of the Swiss National Bank

subject: Re: From Swiss National Bank (SNB)
body:
Hello! Thank you for sharing this information with me. I appreciate your message regarding the grant approved by US President Joe Biden. Could you please provide more details about how the process works and what steps I need to take to receive the funds?

Best wishes,
Gloria

subject: Re: From Swiss National Bank (SNB)
body:
Hello! Thank you for reaching out to me with this information from the Swiss National Bank SNB. I appreciate your message. Could you please provide more details about the grant approved by US President Joe Biden? How did I become eligible for this social grant?

Best wishes,
Gloria
